trans-unit.source: Example Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用实例

trans-unit.source: For mobile numbers in some countries, you can also find out information about which carrier originally owned a phone number.
trans-unit.target: 对于一些国家的手机号码,你还可以查到原来哪个运营商拥有的电话号码的信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the other functionality available from the library, look in the unit tests or in the original libphonenumber project.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the other functionality available from the library, look in the unit tests or in the original libphonenumber project.

trans-unit.source: Force-load the carrier metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.carrier.
trans-unit.target: Force-load the carrier metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.carrier .

trans-unit.source: Force-load the geocoding metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.geocoder.
trans-unit.target: Force-load the geocoding metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.geocoder .

trans-unit.source: Force-load the normal metadata by calling phonenumbers.PhoneMetadata.load_all().
trans-unit.target: Force-load the normal metadata by calling phonenumbers.PhoneMetadata.load_all() .

trans-unit.source: Force-load the timezone metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.timezone.
trans-unit.target: Force-load the timezone metadata by invoking import phonenumbers.timezone .

trans-unit.source: If you need to ensure that the metadata memory use is accounted for at start of day (i.e. that a subsequent on-demand load of metadata will not cause a pause or memory exhaustion):
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要确保元数据的内存使用在一天开始时就被计算在内(即后续元数据的按需加载不会导致暂停或内存耗尽)。

trans-unit.source: If your application has a UI that allows the user to type in a phone number, it's nice to get the formatting applied as the user types. The AsYouTypeFormatter object allows this.
trans-unit.target: If your application has a UI that allows the user to type in a phone number, it's nice to get the formatting applied as the user types. The AsYouTypeFormatter object allows this.

trans-unit.source: In particular:
trans-unit.target: 特别是:

trans-unit.source: Install using pip with:
trans-unit.target: Install using pip with:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Memory Usage
trans-unit.target: 内存使用情况

trans-unit.source: Once you've got a phone number, a common task is to format it in a standardized format. There are a few formats available (under PhoneNumberFormat), and the format_number function does the formatting.
trans-unit.target: Once you've got a phone number, a common task is to format it in a standardized format. There are a few formats available (under PhoneNumberFormat ), and the format_number function does the formatting.

trans-unit.source: Original Java code is Copyright (C) 2009-2015 The Libphonenumber Authors.
trans-unit.target: 原创Java代码是版权(C)2009-2015 Libphonenumber作者。

trans-unit.source: Project Layout
trans-unit.target: 项目布局

trans-unit.source: Python version of Google's common library for parsing, formatting, storing and validating international phone numbers.
trans-unit.target: Google常用库的Python版本,用于解析、格式化、存储和验证国际电话号码。

trans-unit.source: Release HISTORY, derived from upstream release notes.
trans-unit.target: Release HISTORY, derived from upstream release notes.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, you've got a larger block of text that may or may not have some phone numbers inside it. For this, the PhoneNumberMatcher object provides the relevant functionality; you can iterate over it to retrieve a sequence of PhoneNumberMatch objects. Each of these match objects holds a PhoneNumber object together with information about where the match occurred in the original string.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes, you've got a larger block of text that may or may not have some phone numbers inside it. For this, the PhoneNumberMatcher object provides the relevant functionality; you can iterate over it to retrieve a sequence of PhoneNumberMatch objects. Each of these match objects holds a PhoneNumber object together with information about where the match occurred in the original string.

trans-unit.source: The PhoneNumber object that parse produces typically still needs to be validated, to check whether it's a possible number (e.g. it has the right number of digits) or a valid number (e.g. it's in an assigned exchange).
trans-unit.target: The PhoneNumber object that parse produces typically still needs to be validated, to check whether it's a possible number (e.g. it has the right number of digits) or a valid number (e.g. it's in an assigned exchange).

trans-unit.source: The parse function will also fail completely (with a NumberParseException) on inputs that cannot be uniquely parsed, or that can't possibly be phone numbers.
trans-unit.target: The parse function will also fail completely (with a NumberParseException ) on inputs that cannot be uniquely parsed, or that can't possibly be phone numbers.

trans-unit.source: The phonenumberslite version of the package does not include the geocoding, carrier and timezone metadata, which can be useful if you have problems installing the main phonenumbers package due to space/memory limitations.
trans-unit.target: The phonenumberslite version of the package does not include the geocoding, carrier and timezone metadata, which can be useful if you have problems installing the main phonenumbers package due to space/memory limitations.

trans-unit.source: The python/ directory holds the Python code.
trans-unit.target: The python/ directory holds the Python code.

trans-unit.source: The resources/ directory is a copy of the resources/ directory from libphonenumber. This is not needed to run the Python code, but is needed when upstream changes to the master metadata need to be incorporated.
trans-unit.target: The resources/ directory is a copy of the resources/ directory from libphonenumber. This is not needed to run the Python code, but is needed when upstream changes to the master metadata need to be incorporated.

trans-unit.source: The tools/ directory holds the tools that are used to process upstream changes to the master metadata.
trans-unit.target: The tools/ directory holds the tools that are used to process upstream changes to the master metadata.

trans-unit.source: The carrier metadata is only loaded on the first use of one of the mapping functions (carrier.name_for_number or carrier.name_for_valid_number).
trans-unit.target: The carrier metadata is only loaded on the first use of one of the mapping functions ( carrier.name_for_number or carrier.name_for_valid_number ).

trans-unit.source: The geocoding metadata (which is over 100 megabytes) is only loaded on the first use of one of the geocoding functions (geocoder.description_for_number, geocoder.description_for_valid_number or geocoder.country_name_for_number).
trans-unit.target: The geocoding metadata (which is over 100 megabytes) is only loaded on the first use of one of the geocoding functions ( geocoder.description_for_number , geocoder.description_for_valid_number or geocoder.country_name_for_number ).

trans-unit.source: The library includes a lot of metadata, giving a significant memory overhead. This metadata is loaded on-demand so that the memory footprint of applications that only use a subset of the library functionality is not adversely affected.
trans-unit.target: 该库包含了大量的元数据,带来了巨大的内存开销。这些元数据是按需加载的,因此只使用库功能子集的应用程序的内存占用不会受到不利影响。

trans-unit.source: The main object that the library deals with is a PhoneNumber object. You can create this from a string representing a phone number using the parse function, but you also need to specify the country that the phone number is being dialled from (unless the number is in E.164 format, which is globally unique).
trans-unit.target: The main object that the library deals with is a PhoneNumber object. You can create this from a string representing a phone number using the parse function, but you also need to specify the country that the phone number is being dialled from (unless the number is in E.164 format, which is globally unique).

trans-unit.source: The normal metadata for each region is only loaded on the first time that metadata for that region is needed.
trans-unit.target: 每个区域的正常元数据只在第一次需要该区域的元数据时才被加载。

trans-unit.source: The timezone metadata is only loaded on the first use of one of the timezone functions (time_zones_for_number or time_zones_for_geographical_number).
trans-unit.target: The timezone metadata is only loaded on the first use of one of the timezone functions ( time_zones_for_number or time_zones_for_geographical_number ).

trans-unit.source: This is a Python port of Google's libphonenumber library It supports Python 2.5-2.7 and Python 3.x (in the same codebase, with no 2to3 conversion needed).
trans-unit.target: This is a Python port of Google's libphonenumber library It supports Python 2.5-2.7 and Python 3.x (in the same codebase, with no 2to3 conversion needed).

trans-unit.source: You might also be able to retrieve a list of time zone names that the number potentially belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以检索到该号码可能属于的时区名称列表。

trans-unit.source: You might want to get some information about the location that corresponds to a phone number. The geocoder.area_description_for_number does this, when possible.
trans-unit.target: You might want to get some information about the location that corresponds to a phone number. The geocoder.area_description_for_number does this, when possible.

trans-unit.source: phonenumbers Python Library
trans-unit.target: phonenumbers Python库
